sense.name: Move quickly in a straight line.
sense.commentary: INCLUDES: STREAK ACROSS, STREAK THROUGH, STREAK AROUND, STREAK BY
sense.examples: The plane streaked across the sky. A cat streaked through the yard. The child streaked around the room for several minutes before settling down. We streaked by a cop and then slammed on the breaks.

sense.name: Run naked in a public place.
sense.examples: Students streaked through the quad. Teenagers streaked the event, causing patrons to call the police.

sense.name: Mark with spots or blotches of different color or shade of color as if stained.
sense.examples: Bleach streaked the clothing. Rain streaked the windows after I had spent all day washing them.
